Reviews.Title: Do not like this phone, sorry I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Lakeasha M
Reviews.Content: I oringally thought  this was going to be  a full sized touch screen phone, only to my disappointment  it turned out to be a mircoscopic little phone of crap. Yes it is great that I can access the fm radio, but only with use from the headphones. The phone does not hold much memory so I had to buy a mirco sd card. I also do not like how the camera has no flash or zoom in or out function as my old phone that is not a touch screen has. This phone doesn't even fit into a case or screen protector, the samsung galaxy mini is much better, and the price for this phone is a ripoff, should go for at least $ 40.

Reviews.Title: horrible antenna reception
Reviews.Author: Mariana Buela
Reviews.Content: horrible antenna reception. probably cause it is a cheap cell, however I normally don't spend much in cells and never had such a bad experience. I will not buy samsung cells anymore

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: book lover
Reviews.Content: To hard to figure out how to use. I did like that it was small but otherwise I really didnt like it. Plan to try to sell it.

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend this phone to anyone.
Reviews.Author: William Colbert "the old man"
Reviews.Content: can't keep the phone in your pocket in the off position.  It turns is self on.  If you forget to lock it in the on position the phone will dial a directory number.  I would not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: OK Phone
Reviews.Author: Fred J Goodrich
Reviews.Content: The phone looks good and is small and compact.  Most of the features work well.  Touch screens is a bit sensitive and can send you all over the place or not open anything when you want it to.  Makes using the phone a bit awkward at times.

Reviews.Title: i didnt like it at first sight so i didnt use it,
Reviews.Author: dionne parker
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in the size  its very  much smaller than what I expected.i  ended up giving it away,

Reviews.Title: re samsung champ deluxe duos c3312
Reviews.Author: everett sutherland
Reviews.Content: this is a handy neat phone that fits lovely in your hand and pocket. cant get a case to fit it though as it is smaller than regular phones. love it overall

Reviews.Title: It's a great product and good price
Reviews.Author: Martin Casulo
Reviews.Content: It's a great product and good price my wife use all days and she like it. Not is a Android Phone but it's very good O.S.Lo recomiendo ampliamente, se seteo solo a castellano con solo ponerle los SIMs funciona de primera y esta liberado para cuaquier operadora.

Reviews.Title: good phone,it work ok  small screem
Reviews.Author: VE59296jose nuñez
Reviews.Content: good phone I buy for my mother is really good price for quality, and is really nice have the option of two chips
